attributes.title: Shortcut For The Mind To Achieve Paramashivatva!
attributes.description:
9 MARCH 2020(8:06 AM IST,MONDAY)

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA:

*WHEN YOUR INTELLIGENCE ADOPTS TYAGA AS STRATEGY, MOST BRILLIANT STRATEGY FOR YOUR EXISTENCE, SURVIVAL, EXPANSION - YOU ACHIEVE THE ULTIMATE. THE DEFINITION OF THE ULTIMATE GOAL IS AWAKENING OF CONSCIOUSNESS IN YOU.

*MIND NEVER WANTS STRAIGHTFORWARD STRATEGY. IT WANTS CUNNING STRATEGY. TYAGA IS THE CUNNING  STRATEGY.ALL OF US KNOW  WE ARE MOVING TOWARDS CERTAIN GOAL. FOR SOMEONE HAVING MILLION DOLLAR, FOR SOMEONE PEACEFUL LIFE, FOR SOMEONE POLITICAL SUCCESS, ACHIEVING CERTAIN POST/POWER, FOR SOMEONE ELSE,PARAMASHIVA IS THE ULTIMATE, BUT PRACTICALLY YOU WANT TO EVERYTHING ELSE ALSO AND THIS ALSO, FOR SOMEONE ELSE, PARAMASHIVA IS EVERYTHING AND THE ULTIMATE.

*HUMAN MIND ALWAYS WANTS SHORTCUTS. IT BELIEVES THE STRAIGHT FORWARD ROUTES WILL BE ALWAYS TAKING LONGER. IF YOU WANT SHORTCUT, CUNNING STRATEGY TO ACHIEVE PARAMASHIVATVA- ADOPT TYAGA! 

*TYAGA TAKES AWAY TONNES OF THINGS, OBSTACLES, PROBLEMS, CONFUSIONS, DELUSIONS, AND MAKES YOU REALISE PARAMASHIVA. TYAGA INFUSES ENERGY INTO THE RIGHT SPACE, INTO THE RIGHT SOURCE, RIGHT EXISTENCE. 

*WHEN YOU HAVE YOUR MUSCLES AND THE TUMOUR, YOU NEED TO ENERGISE YOUR MUSCLES AND MAKE THE TUMOUR WITHER AWAY. TYAGA CAN INFUSE ENERGY INTO YOU, YOUR CORE, AND MAKE YOUR DELUSION WITHER AWAY. DELUSION CAN JUST WITHER AWAY! EGO CAN JUST WITHER AWAY! 

*MANY TIMES, EVEN THROUGH SPIRITUAL PRACTISES, YOU EMPOWER YOUR DELUSION! NOT THE SPIRITUAL EXISTENCE OF YOU! NOTHING. NOTHING WILL HELP YOU WHICH EMPOWERS YOUR TUMOURS, YOUR ARROGANCE, YOUR DELUSION! THIS IS DIRECTLY FROM PARAMASHIVA: PARAMASHIVA IS PREPARING ALL OF US FOR A HUGE POSITIVE EXPLOSION. HE IS PREPARING ALL OF YOU AND ME. PREPARING ME TO MANIFEST AND ALL OF YOU TO RECEIVE - FOR A HUGE POWERFUL POSITIVE EXPLOSION FOR THE WHOLE PLANET EARTH! NOT JUST FOR ME, YOU AND KAILAASA, BUT WHOLE PLANET EARTH! HE IS ACTIVELY DOING IT! 

*YOU CAN EXPECT IN NOT COMING FEW MONTHS BUT FEW WEEKS OF GREAT SPIRITUAL PROGRAMS. THIS WHOLE TYAGA SERIES ARE ONLY PREPARING YOU. IN THE SPIRITUAL PATH, THE MOST SHORTCUT IS TYAGA. I AM SO GRATEFUL TO MY GURUS BECAUSE THE MADE ME REALISE THE GOAL IS PARAMASHIVA, PROPER COGNIZABLE, INSPIRING, SELF DRIVING , DEFINITIVE EXPERIENCE OF PARAMASHIVA , THEY WERE ABLE TO GIVE ME. AND THEY MADE ME REALISE TYAGA IS THE SHORTCUT STRATEGY. 

*I AM SO HAPPY THE ULTIMATE WAS EXPERIENTIALLY DEFINED INSIDE ME. THE DEFINITION I CARRY FOR PARAMASHIVA IS A DEFINITIVE EXPERIENCE. I ALSO REALISE THE MOST CUNNING SHORTCUT STRATEGY IS TYAGA. MIND DOES NOT BELIEVE IN LONG TERM STRATEGY. 

*I AM OPENLY TELLING YOU, AFTER CREATING A NATION, OUR OWN RESERVE BANK , EVERYTHING AS PER THE COSMIC LAWS OF HINDUISM - I TELL YOU, MONEY IS A DELUSORY MECHANISM CREATED BY CUNNING PEOPLE TO KEEP YOU UNDER THEIR CONTROL. I AM NOT SAYING THROW AWAY YOUR MONEY. I AM SAYING, WAKE UP TO THE TRUTH SO THAT YOUR CONSCIOUS EXPLOSION SHOULD NOT BE COMPROMISED OR SECOND PRIORITY. 

*DEVELOP WITH THE STAMINA OF TYAGA, YOU WILL MAKE MILLION DOLLAR PER YEAR. EVEN FOR MONEY, POWER, POSITION - EVEN THESE ARE NOT ULTIMATE, WHEN YOU BRING TYAGA INTO YOUR COGNITION AND THINKING YOU WILL REALISE, HOW MEDIOCRE MIND IS SUBDUED, CONTROLLED, BRAINWASHED THROUGH GLITTERY GOLDS. THE GLITTERY GOLD DELUDES YOU AND KEEPS YOU AS MEDIOCRE. MEDIOCRE GOALS IN LIFE IS SIN. 

*IF I HAVE TO DEFINE SIN: HAVING MEDIOCRE GOALS AS ULTIMATE IN YOUR COGNITION. 20 YEARS OF EXTREME SINCERITY, I WORKED AND MADE THIS INDIAN SANGHA HAPPEN. IF YOU SEE ALL THE OLD PHOTOS, VIDEOS, ONENESS, YOU WILL SEE HOW EVERY ASHRAM, SARVAJNAPEETAM I BUILD AND EVERY PERSON I CHISELED AND TRAINED. ONE PERSON AT A TIME. ONE PROPERTY AT A TIME. ONE DEITY AT A TIME. THIS IS HOW I WORKED AND MADE NITHYANANDA SANGHA, KAILAASA IN INDIA. BUT I REALISED THE SITUATION DEMANDS ME DOING TYAGA, EVEN FOR A SECOND.

*THE MOMENT I UNDERSTOOD, CONSCIOUSLY THAT IF I HAVE TO FULFILL THE GOAL PARAMASHIVA HAS GIVEN ME, I HAVE DO TYAGA OF KAILAASA IN INDIA, ONLY THEN I CAN FULFILL THE PURPOSE PARAMASHIVA HAS GIVEN ME - THAT’S ALL! I DECIDED; ‘YES  MAHADEVA!’ THE ELITE WAY OF DOING TYAGA IS ‘ YES MAHADEVA! AS PER YOUR WILL!’ 

*THAT STRENGTH! MY ABILITY TO DO TYAGA GIVES ME CONFIDENCE ON ME ABOUT ME. THE BIGGEST STRENGTH OF YOUR LIFE  IS WHAT YOU FEEL AS YOUR STRENGTH FOR YOU. I MYSELF FEEL I AM A TYAGI, I CAN GIVE UP ANYTHING!
